product_name: Mountain Hardwear South Col 70 OutDry Pack
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear South Col 70 OutDry(R) Pack sports a waterproof membrane to help keep contents dry and has a removable suspension for great versatility on multi-day trips. Main compartment features OutDry membrane construction to help keep your gear dry. Unlike other fabrics that let water pool between the membrane and the shell, OutDry bonds a durable waterproof membrane directly to the shell for a completely sealed interface. HardWave suspension conforms comfortably to the curve of your back and distributes weight evenly but can be removed from pack for carrying light loads. Large zippered front pocket allows storage of frequently needed items or tools and maintains volume even when main compartment is full. Multiple lash points and long compression webbing allow for overloading while effectively reducing volume as needed to keep any size load stable. The Mountain Hardwear South Col 70 OutDry Pack features an easy-access crampon stash pocket.
short_description: The Mountain Hardwear South Col 70 OutDry(R) Pack sports a waterproof membrane to help keep contents dry and has a removable suspension for great versatility on multi-day trips.
